Introduction

Hyerim is a South Korean singer under Doubling Music. She is a former member of the girl groups Limesoda and AQUA. She participated in Mnet's reality survival show Girls Planet 999. She will make her solo debut with the mini album 너의 세계 on April 4, 2022.
